description: Situated in an attractive retro-style room to the rear of an elegant delicatessen, this restaurant offers just four tables and a restricted menu of top-quality, traditional Emilian dishes. In the evening, the restaurant is open by reservation only for groups of at least 12 people with a pre-arranged menu.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
